summary: Adds a face preset to RaceMenu.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Trebuchet MS]This is my first ever face preset. 

A simple nord face preset to add to your game if you are to lazy to build one yourself ;). 

Install manually: Put the .json file into C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data\SKSE\Plugins\CharGen\Presets
Or install by NMM[/font]

[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=4]Requirements to get the exakt same look:[/size][/font]
[font=Trebuchet MS]Body mod: https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709
Body mod 2: https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602 UNP VERSION
Hair: https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/search/ YOU WILL NEED FNIS (Fores new idles) https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11811
Eyes: https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56056[/font]

[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=4]Optional:[/size][/font]
[font=Trebuchet MS]ENB in screenshots: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73864/?
Facelight Plus: https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71063[/font]
author: adaxon012
